title: Modern Android Development with Jetpack Compose
description: Learn how to build beautiful, reactive UIs with Jetpack Compose. This hands-on workshop will guide you through creating a real Android app from scratch.

title: Building Serverless Apps with Firebase
description: Discover how to create powerful serverless applications using Firebase Cloud Functions, Authentication, and Firestore.

title: Introduction to Machine Learning with TensorFlow
description: Get started with machine learning! Build and train your first neural network using TensorFlow and deploy it to production.
